NEW_COMP.TITLE: New Component
NEW_COMP.NAME: Name
NEW_COMP.NAME_PATTERN: Name must consist of A-Z a-z 0-9 -_
NEW_COMP.SYMBOL_PATTERN: Symbol must consist of A-Z a-z 0-9 -_

RELOAD.TITLE: Reload Required
RELOAD.QUESTION:
For this change to take effect, the editor has to be reloaded.
Do you want to reload this page now?

UNSAVED_CHANGES.TITLE: Unsaved Changes
UNSAVED_CHANGES.QUESTION: The current project has unsaved changes, by opening another project, these changes may be lost!

SHARE.TITLE: Share Project {{project}}
SHARE.INFO_TEXT: Please type in the email-addresses or usernames of the users, with whom you want to share this project.
SHARE.EMAIL_USER_ALREADY_ADDED: Email or username has already been added
SHARE.NOT_FOUND_ERROR: Some email addresses or user names were not found, share was created or updated anyways.

AND.NAME: AND Gate
AND.DESCRIPTION: Output is high if all inputs are high.

NOT.NAME: NOT Gate
NOT.DESCRIPTION: Output is high if input is low.

OR.NAME: OR Gate
OR.DESCRIPTION: Output is high if at least one input is high.

XOR.NAME: XOR Gate
XOR.DESCRIPTION: Output is high if an odd number of inputs are high.

DELAY.NAME: Delay
DELAY.DESCRIPTION: Output equals Input. Adds one tick delay to the signal.

CLOCK.NAME: Clock
CLOCK.DESCRIPTION:
Periodically sends a one tick long pulse.
Delay between pulses can be configured.

TEXT.NAME: Text
TEXT.DESCRIPTION: Text which you can place on the canvas.

ROM.NAME: ROM
ROM.DESCRIPTION:
Read only Memory.
Can be used for program code, for example.

D_FF.NAME: D Flip Flop
D_FF.DESCRIPTION: Holds a state. State on (D) gets saved on rising edge.

JK_FF.NAME: JK Flip Flop
JK_FF.DESCRIPTION:
Holds a state. Set (J) to high to set and (K) to high to reset. Toggles output if both are high.
Triggers on rising edge.

SR_FF.NAME: SR Flip Flop
SR_FF.DESCRIPTION:
Holds a state. Set (S) to high to set and (R) to high to reset.
Triggers on rising edge.

BUTTON.NAME: Button
BUTTON.DESCRIPTION: Can be clicked to emit a pulse signal.

LEVER.NAME: Switch
LEVER.DESCRIPTION: Can be switched on and off during simulation.

LED.NAME: LED
LED.DESCRIPTION: Switches on or off depending on the applied input.

SEGMENT_DISPLAY.NAME: Segment Display
SEGMENT_DISPLAY.DESCRIPTION: Displays a binary input as decimal number

INPUT.NAME: Input Plug
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Place this where the inputs of you self-defined components should be

OUTPUT.NAME: Output Plug
OUTPUT.DESCRIPTION: Place this where the outputs of you self-defined components should be

WORK_MODE_DES.selectCut: Selecting Elements, but cut wires off

COMPILE.CIRCULAR_DEP: Circular dependency in components. {{src}} must not include {{comp}}.

PROJECTS.RESOLVE_DEPS: Unable to resolve dependencies of Project
PROJECTS.PROJECT_AS_COMP: Unable to open Project as Component

PROJECTS.SAVE_ALL: Saved Project and all open Components
PROJECTS.EXPORT: Exported Project and all included Components
